name: Sachithra Senanayake
bio: Senanayake Mudiyanselage Sachithra Madhushanka Senanayake, commonly called Sachithra Senanayake (Sinhala: සචිත්‍ර සේනානායක; born 9 February 1985) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays all three formats of the game and a singer. He is first-class cricketer, who currently plays limited overs cricket. An bowling all-rounder, he bats right-handed and bowls off spin. He has played first-class cricket for the Sinhalese Sports Club since 2006.[1]
